title: Samples, ca. 1910
dimensions:
a. Warp: 21.5 cm [8.5"]  Cut top and bottom.
    Weft: 65 cm [25.5"]  Selvedge right side, cut other side.
b. Warp: 20.5 cm [8"]  Cut top and bottom.
    Weft: 65 cm [25.5"] Selvedge left side, cut other side.
c. Warp: 21.5 cm [8.5"] Cut top and bottom.
    Weft:  14 cm [5.5"] Selvedge left side, cut other side.
creditline: Gift of Margaret and Teresa Gloster in memory of Mary and Margaret McElligott
description:
a. Olive green ground with light green pattern.
b. Olive green on olive green.
c. Gold color on gold color.
